name: Error Terror
description:
Dodge the enemies by using your double jump and gravity toggle           

Controls:

Up Arrow Key : Jump & Double Jump
Down Arrow Key : Gravity Toggle

Gravity Toggle increases your gravity and gets you to the ground faster this is essential to get any good score as you can quickly reset your Double Jump

Any Criticism or Feedback is helpful so please tell me in the comments 

Note : This is my Second game ever 
               Made in Godot
